name: Golden Elegance
description: Golden Elegance short square press-on nails feature a blend of ivory and nude tones, highlighted with gold accents and glitter details.

name: Crystal Glam
description: The Crystal Glam short coffin press-on nails feature a sleek silver finish with bold crystal accents, perfect for adding a touch of luxury and elegance..

name: Midnight Sparkle
description: Midnight Sparkle press-on nails feature a mix of silver designs, gemstones, and star embellishments, offering a celestial and glamorous style.

name: Comic Vibes
description: Comic Vibes medium-length coffin press-on nails feature playful cartoon designs with vibrant colors, perfect for adding a fun and quirky touch to your look.

name: Rose Glam
description: Rose Glam medium-length coffin press-on nails feature a soft rose hue with elegant rhinestone accents and geometric silver detailing, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to your style.

name: Butterfly Bloom
description: Butterfly Bloom medium-length coffin press-on nails feature delicate butterfly and floral embellishments with a soft white finish, offering an elegant and whimsical touch to your style.

name: Midnight Waves
description: Midnight Waves press-on nails feature a sleek matte black base with flowing silver accents, offering a bold and modern look.

name: Icy Elegance
description: Icy Elegance press-on nails feature a frosty white finish with delicate silver accents and textured designs, offering a sleek and sophisticated winter-inspired look.

name: Cow Love
description: Cow Love medium-length coffin press-on nails feature playful black-and-white cow print designs with cute heart and star accents, perfect for a fun and trendy look.

name: Ruby Hearts
description: Ruby Hearts medium-length coffin press-on nails feature a rich red gradient with gold heart accents and sparkling rhinestones, creating an elegant and romantic look.

name: Sweet Treats
description: Sweet Treats short square press-on nails feature playful designs inspired by desserts and snacks, with pretzel,candy and donut accents for a fun and whimsical look.

name: Cozy Bear
description: Cozy Bear short square press-on nails feature adorable bear and dessert-themed designs with plaid patterns, perfect for a fun and playful look.
